name: interschool

between different schools: At the age of ten, she began to compete in interschool races. We want more students to experience inter-school sport in a positive way.
More examplesFewer examplesHe excelled in badminton, winning trophies in interschool tournaments.Students have the opportunity to participate in inter-school mock trial competitions.Organizers are trying to raise money to allow youngsters to compete in interschool sports events.A large number of students competed in the first round of the interschool chess tournament.
